name: Dastardly Finish
description: You can take advantage of an enemy’s debilitated state to attempt a coup de grace.
benefit: You can deliver a coup de grace to cowering or stunned targets.
normal: You can only coup de grace helpless targets.
staminaText: You can spend 10 stamina points to deliver a coup de grace against two helpless, cowering, or stunned targets within your reach as a fullround action. This provokes attacks of opportunity twice—one for each coup de grace.
mythicDescription: You strike downed, dazed, and staggered opponents with deadly efficiency.
mythicBenefit: You can deliver a coup de grace to dazed and staggered non-mythic opponents. In addition, when any creature makes a Fortitude saving throw to survive one of your coup de grace attempts, it takes a penalty to that saving throw equal to your tier.
